dependencies.description:
Catch2 is a multi-paradigm test framework for C++, which also supports
Objective-C (and maybe C).
dependencies.name: catch2

dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.
dependencies.name: cmake

dependencies.description:
fmt (formerly cppformat) is an open-source formatting library. It can be
used as a safe alternative to printf or as a fast alternative to C++
IOStreams.
dependencies.name: fmt

dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.
dependencies.name: hdf5

dependencies.description: HighFive - Header only C++ HDF5 interface
dependencies.name: highfive

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
pybind11 -- Seamless operability between C++11 and Python. pybind11 is a
lightweight header-only library that exposes C++ types in Python and
vice versa, mainly to create Python bindings of existing C++ code. Its
goals and syntax are similar to the excellent Boost.Python library by
David Abrahams: to minimize boilerplate code in traditional extension
modules by inferring type information using compile-time introspection.
dependencies.name: py-pybind11

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: Spatial indexer for geometries and morphologies
dependent_to.name: py-brain-indexer

dependent_to.description:
Python library for reading, writing, and manipulating large-scale
vasculature datasets
dependent_to.name: py-vascpy

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
